From what I can gather, you are saying it is possible to format your main disk partition (that which Windows is installed on)? Well yes, that is true, and that would be a very bad idea! The program gives you several warnings before you make this stupid mistake, however. Most people have the common sense not to do it.

@Zache51

There is no installation required, just unzip it. The executable for the program is located in the "bin" folder. Just make a shortcut and place the program wherever you desire.
I figured but I installed the free version instead and overwrote the files to get a shortcut lol. But it worket!

*** If you don't know how to use advanced software, do a LOT of reading BEFORE YOU select any potentially destructive option! ***

This package works beautifully, but be advised, it offers MANY powerful options ~ including options that WILL format your hard drive and TOTALLY wipe it of all data!

If you are foolish enough to wipe your drive with options YOU SELECT;  DON'T shoot the messenger (who was kind enough to provide the package here) because of your stupidity.
